body:
Hi Jan,


I'm glad this resolved most of your issues. 


Regarding arguments past A10, these variables were provided as a convenience in rayinit.cal as shorthand for arg(N), so to get "A11" just use arg(11), instead.


Cheers,
-Greg
___
